news_header: Varonis Systems announces a $100 million share repurchase program.
news_original_title: Varonis Systems To Repurchase $100 MLn Shares
news_text: Data security firm Varonis Systems, Inc. has announced that its board has authorized a share repurchase program of up to $100 million in common stock over the next 12 months. Currently, shares are up 3.25 percent at $41.91 with a trading volume of 270,622 shares. The company is authorized to repurchase shares through various means, including open market purchases and privately-negotiated transactions.
